Spells:
Augury (P2 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Divi): Self learns weal or woe outcome of a proposed act up to 30 min in the future [R]
Banishing Smite (P5 Abju): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +5d10 HP force, plus banishment to home plane or a demiplane for conc up to 1 min if foe is reduced to 50 HP
Blinding Smite (P3 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +3d8 HP radiant and blinds (Constitution ends) for conc up to 1 min
Call Lightning (P3 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Conj): R120' 5' radius inflicts 3d10 HP lightning (Dexterity half; +1d10 HP if using a natural storm) 1/rd for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Commune With Nature (P5 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Divi): Self gains 3 facts about nature w/in 3 miles (300' underground) [R]
Compelled Duel (P1 Ench): R30' Target stays w/in 30' of self (Wisdom neg) and suffers Disadv on attacks on others for conc up to 1 min; self attacking another or a successful attack on target by an ally ends
Control Water (P4 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Tran): R300' 100' water rises 20', parts, redirects, or whirlpools for conc up to 10 min
Create Or Destroy Water (P1 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Tran): R30' Creates or destroys 10 gallons of water or fog in a 30' cube [+Level affects +10 gallons or +5' cube]
Crusader's Mantle (P3 Evoc): Ally attacks in 30' radius inflict +1d4 HP radiant for conc up to 1 min
Dancing Lights (B0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and move 60'/rd for conc up to 1 min
Death Ward (P4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP for 8 hrs
Detect Evil And Good (P1 Divi): R30' Self senses aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends, undead, consecration, and desecration for conc up to 10 min
Divine Favor (P1 Evoc): Self weapons inflict +1d4 HP radiant for conc up to 1 min
Expeditious Retreat (P1 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Tran): Self gains a bonus Dash 1/rd for conc up to 10 min
Find Steed (P2 Conj): R10' Self gains service from a summoned spirit in steed form
Freedom Of Movement (P4 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments for 1 hr
Freedom Of The Waves (P3 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Conj): R120' 15' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and knocks prone (Strength neg); self may teleport w/in affected area
Freedom Of The Winds (P5 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Abju): Self gains 60' flying speed and Adv vs. grapple, restraint, and paralysis for conc up to 10 min; self may teleport 60', ending spell
Lesser Restoration (P2 Abju): Touched recovers from blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Locate Creature (P4 Divi): Self learns location of specified creature or species w/in 1000' for conc up to 1 hr
Locate Object (P2 Divi): Self learns location of specified object or type w/in 1000' for conc up to 10 min
Longstrider (B1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Magic Circle (P3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents choice of entry or exit (Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts Disadv on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by choice of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead for 1 hr [+Level extends duration +1 hr]
Minor Illusion (B0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Minor Illusion (Forest Gnome0 [Natural Illusionist] Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Misty Step (P2 [Oath Of The Open Sea] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Raise Dead (P5 Necr): Restores life to and removes diseases and poisons from a willing touched 10-day-old corpse
Staggering Smite (P4 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack w/in conc up to 1 min inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, Disadv on attacks and ability checks for 1 rd, and no Reaction for 1 rd
Thunderous Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP thunder and 10' push (Strength HP only) for conc up to 1 min

Magic Initiate (Bard): Knows 2 B0 spells/May cast chosen B1 spell 1/long rest
Aura Of Liberation: R30' Targets cannot be grappled or restrained, ignore underwater movement and attack penalties

Notes
Validation Errors:
